tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_producers (
    producer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    producer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    license_number TEXT UNIQUE,
    license_type TEXT,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE license_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  producer_id INT,
  license_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  license_expiry_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (producer_id) REFERENCES media_producers(producer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE licenses (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    license_number VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    issued_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE,
    producer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (producer_id) REFERENCES media_producers(producer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE licenses (
  license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  license_number VARCHAR(10) UNIQUE,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  producer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (producer_id) REFERENCES media_producers(producer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE license_history (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  license_id INT,
  issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
  expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
  status TEXT NOT NULL,
  body_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (license_id) REFERENCES licenses(license_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (body_id) REFERENCES regulatory_bodies(body_id)
);

CREATE TABLE media_content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    producer_id UUID REFERENCES media_producers(producer_id),
    release_date DATE NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE license_audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    action_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID,
    license_number VARCHAR(50) REFERENCES media_producers(license_number)
);
